Interface FrontEnd

All Known Implementing Classes:
FrontEndStub
public interface FrontEnd
Author:
Giovanni Caire - TILAB

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    REMOTE_BACK_END_ADDRESSES
    This constant is the name of the property whose value contains the list of addresses where a contaner Front End can contact its Back End.

    • REMOTE_BACK_END_ADDRESSES

      static final String REMOTE_BACK_END_ADDRESSES
      This constant is the name of the property whose value contains the list of addresses where a contaner Front End can contact its Back End.

  • Method Details

    • createAgent

      void createAgent(String name, String className, String[] args) throws IMTPException
      Request the FrontEnd container to create a new agent.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new agent.
      className - The class of the new agent.
      args - The arguments to be passed to the new agent.
      Throws:
      IMTPException

      Request the FrontEnd container to kill an agent.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the agent to kill.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException
      IMTPException

    • messageIn

      void messageIn(ACLMessage msg, String receiver) throws NotFoundException, IMTPException
      Pass an ACLMessage to the FrontEnd for posting.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to be posted.
      receiver - The name of the receiver agent.

      NotFoundException
